title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. XVI, pt. 8186 - State Equalization Rates, Ratios And Adjustments
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. XVI, pt. 8186 - State Equalization Rates, Ratios And Adjustments

State Regulations

Subpart 8186-1 - General Provisions (§ 8186-1.4 to 8186-1.16)

Subpart 8186-2 - State Equalization Rates (§ 8186-2.3 to 8186-2.18)

Subpart 8186-3 - Special Equalization Rates And Changes In Level Of Assessment For Assessments, Ceilings, Exemptions And Apportionment Purposes (§ 8186-3.1 to 8186-3.10)

Subpart 8186-4 - County Equalization (§ 8186-4.3)

Subpart 8186-5 - Special Equalization Rates For Certain Parts Of Cities And Towns (§ 8186-5.3 to 8186-5.5)

Subpart 8186-6 - Special Equalization Rates For Certain School Districts (§ 8186-6.7)

Subpart 8186-9 - Adjusted Base Proportions For Special Assessing Units (§ 8186-9.3 to 8186-9.8)

Subpart 8186-10 - Adjusted Base Proportions For Certain Approved Assessing Units (§ 8186-10.3 to 8186-10.8)

Subpart 8186-15 - Complaint Review (§ 8186-15.2 to 8186-15.12)

Subpart 8186-24 - 1989 Market Value Survey Procedures (§ 8186-24.1 to 8186-24.14)

Subpart 8186-25 - Market Value Update Survey Procedures Subsequent To The 1987 Survey (§ 8186-25.1 to 8186-25.3)

Subpart 8186-26 - 1992 Market Value Survey Procedures (§ 8186-26.1 to 8186-26.14)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. XVI, pt. 8186

Statutory authority: Real Property Tax Law, §§ 202[1][k], [l], 214, 312, 470, 504, 575, 590, 592, 594, 596, 816, 842, 845, 848, 1200, 1202, 1208, 1220, 1226, 1252, 1262, 1314, 1315, 1573, 1804, 1806, 1901, 1905, 1906, art. 4, titles 2A, 2B, art. 5, title 2; Agriculture and Markets Law, §§304-a, 307; L. 1987, chs. 416, 634

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
